section.name: soapUI Testimonials
section.p: A fair number of people have found and acknowledged soapUI during its first 6 months of existence, a huge thanks to you all for your encouragement and support!

ul.li: "Thought I'd drop you a note to let you know how valuable I've found soapUI. The company I work has started some web service projects in the last 6 months, and SoapUI has been a very helpful tool for us." - anonymous
"thanks for an excellent project - ... this tool has greatly improved the quality and manageability of our development." - Matthew Feldt

section.p: If you want to be on this list (or removed from it!), dont hesitate to contact us at info@eviware.com.
